colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS GRONG CHOG PA RNAMS KYIS THUGS BZHED PA BSKONG PA'I SLAD DU BRIS DGOS SU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN, SNYIGS MA DUS KYI MTHA' MA LA SLEB PAS RGYAL PO'I GNOD PA BOD PAS DUS 'DIR DGA' ZHIG LA PHAN PA'ANG SRID DAM SNYAM PAS RGYAL PO'I MDOS GZHUNG SOGS KHUNGS THUB RNAMS KYI DANG MI 'GAL BAR BSGREGS PA PO NI DHARMA SVA MI WA GINTRA PA tU SIDDHI MING CAN NO, ,'DIS KYIS 'GRO BA RNAMS NGA RGYAL DANG ZHE SDANG GIS BSKUL BA'I GNOD BYED KYI 'CHAR SGO SNA TSOGS LAS THAR BAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: DHARMA SVA MI WA GINTRA PA tU SIDDHI,
